This module will discuss key topics in statistical theory. First, we look at statistical inference - how we draw conclusions about populations from samples. Then, we discuss some hypothesis testing and do some simple testing. Finally, we look at relationships between features, which sets up regression analysis.

[Prerequisites]{.underline}: Modules 1-3 (Or Equivalent)
